thread.title: Jonathan Jay Jones
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Jonathan Jay Jones

author: Jonathan Jay Jones
title: Jonathan Jay Jones
text: I did quite a bit of shopping both online and in-store for my new sunglasses (non-prescription), and found the selection at Frames Direct beyond compare and the pricing very competitive. A bit daunting when it came to sizing, but on-site tutorials helped guide me to what turned out to be a perfect fit. Follow-up and service was excellent- I gave 4 stars instead of 5 only because I expected my order sooner than received. (this may be my own fault-I am admittedly a bit impatient!) I highly recommend Frames Direct and will definitely order from Frames Direct again for both my prescription and non-prescription glasses.
